channel.title: Axmini Portable Desktop Synthesizer
channel.description:
Hi,
during playing with my Axcore Synth to make a video of it, i thought it would be a good idea to build a smaller and easier to use Synth with the Axoloty Core.
The result is the Axmini Portable Desktop Synth. I think, i finished it in about two weeks.
[Short Description of the Axmini Synthesizer](http://www.synth-project.de/axmini.html)
All the best
Mario

item.title: Axmini Portable Desktop Synthesizer
item.dc:creator: @mongrol
item.description:
@mongrol wrote:

How are you hooking up the knobs to send midi data? I'm working on a similar box and was looking at using Teensy for GPIO and send to Axo via serial.

Read full topic
